mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_marine_student_impression(marine_id,impression) SELECT #{marineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d.dict_data_key FROM t_sys_dict_data d, t_sys_dict_type t WHERE t.is_active = 1 AND d.dict_type_id = t.id AND t.dict_code='student_imp'

insert into t_marine_student_impression (id, marine_id, impression, votes, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{impression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{votes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

update t_marine_student_impression

impression = #{impression,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
